data.text: “Meɖe ɖokuinye fia ame siwo mebia tanye se o,
Ŋkeke blibo la katã mekeke
Ame siwo le dɔmedzoe dom nam
ame siwo nɔa ameɖibɔwo me hedɔa ŋu
Ame siwo gblɔna be,
“Kpɔ ɖa, woŋlɔe ɖi ɖe nye ŋkume ɖaa.
miaƒe nu vɔ̃wo kple mia fofowo tɔwo siaa,
Ale Yehowa gblɔe nye esi,
Mana dzidzimewo nado tso Yakob me,
Saron azu lãnyiƒe na alẽhawo,
“Ke mi ame siwo gblẽ Yehowa ɖi,
maɖo mi ɖi na yi, eye mi katã
Eya ta ale Aƒetɔ Yehowa gblɔe nye esi:
Nye dɔlawo adzi ha le woƒe dziwo
Miagblẽ miaƒe ŋkɔwo ɖi na nye ame tiatiawo
Ame si ayra eɖokui le anyigba dzi la awɔe
“Kpɔ ɖa, mawɔ dziƒo yeye kple anyigba yeye.
gake mikpɔ dzidzɔ,
Matso aseye ɖe Yerusalem ŋu,
“Ɖevi si xɔ ŋkeke ʋɛ aɖewo ko,
Woatu xɔwo anɔ wo me.
Womagatu xɔ, eye ame bubuwo nanɔ wo me,
Womadze agbagba dzodzro,
Matɔ hafi woayɔm.
Amegaxi kple alẽvi aɖu gbe le teƒe ɖeka.
